Assistify_AI_Reload_Description: Reload the settings in order to update the Smarti widget.
Assistify_AI_Smarti_Base_URL_Description: Enter the URL of your Smarti-Server (e.g. http://localhost:8080/).
Assistify_AI_Smarti_Domain_Description: Enter your Smarti Client-Name, that belongs to this Rocket.Chat instance.
Assistify_AI_Smarti_Auth_Token_Descripti: Enter your Smarti Client-Token, to authorize Rocket.Chat to access Smarti.
Assistify_AI_Smarti_Inline_Highlighting_:
Once activated, this will highlight tokens identified by Smarti within the messages list.
Caution: This will trigger an analysis of all messages written - and thus, this will increase load on the Smarti-servers significantly!
Comma separated list of Smarti token types which shall not be highlighted in message texts.
Assistify_AI_Widget_Posting_Type_Descrip: Select how to send Smarti suggestions.
Assistify_AI_RocketChat_Callback_URL_Des: An optional URL to which Smarti shall send the callback when processing asynchronous analysis
Assistify_AI_RocketChat_Webhook_Token_De: Appoint a token for incoming Smarti messages (z.B. key123).
Assistify_AI_Resync_Batchsize_Descriptio: The number of rooms being sent at once when re-syncing
Assistify_AI_Resync_Message_Limit: Max. number of messages to sync per room
Widget_could_not_load: The knowledge base cannot be displayed. We're more than sorry for that! If you're connected to the intranet (you have to in order to fetch results), please let us know so we can fix the issue!
Widget_loading: Knowledge-base has been loading for a while now. Something seems to be wrong here...
Assistify_AI_Google_CS_URL: Google Custom Search JSON API URI
Assistify_AI_Google_CS_KEY_Description: Use the key query parameter to identify your application.
Assistify_AI_Google_CS_ID_Description: Use cx to specify the custom search engine you want to use to perform this search. The search engine must be created with the Control Panel.
